title:
can I launch a canoe and fish in the pond on randle   parkway? fish in trask pond?

why is there no place to launch a kayak or canoe on the ICwaterway or on lumina ave?  there are hundreds of people that have canoes and kayaks in Wilmington and no common access areas with out being rundown by boats being launched. 

  there should be a few places with sandy area just for launching canoes and kayaks.
